snippet: A corner drugstore, an extension of the family kitchen, closes.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Amy D Clark regrets demise of general store called the Mutual Drug Cafeteria in Big Stone Gap, Va, saying it had long been a local gathering place and token of Appalachian culture; notes that store, which was bought out by a franchise, is reminder of the importance of supporting local business.
lead_paragraph: A corner drugstore, an extension of the family kitchen, closes.
